channel.title: Idea validated, prepaid customers, need lead developer (equity partner)
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
We're on a hunt for a CTO/lead developer. Here's what we've done so far:
* Acquired 50 early sign-up requests * Secured an anchor client. Three companies already prepaid. * Identified a niche market with no current competition * Conducting user interviews to understand the industry's process, lay of the land, personas we're dealing with, and the larger pain chain * We're former b2b SaaS sellers and b2b marketers with extensive business experience.
If you're interested in learning more, shoot me an email [omaral@my.yorku.ca] Or, message me here.
Omar

item.title: Idea validated, prepaid customers, need lead developer (equity partner)
item.dc:creator: OnboardNinja
item.description:
Hello everyone!

We’re on a hunt for a CTO/lead developer. Here’s what we’ve done so far:

  • Acquired 50 early sign-up requests
  • Secured an anchor client. Three companies already prepaid.
  • Identified a niche market with no current competition
  • Conducting user interviews to understand the industry’s process, lay of the land, personas we’re dealing with, and the larger pain chain
  • We’re former b2b SaaS sellers and b2b marketers with extensive business experience.

If you’re interested in learning more, shoot me an email [omaral@my.yorku.ca] Or, message me here.

Omar
